moves.1. d4 d5 2. Nf3 Nc6 3. c4 dxc4 4. e4 Bg4: A good use of the White's lack of concentration, the white shouldn't have taken the pawn at b5 from the beginning ..
moves.11. Kd2 Nd4 12. Qd3 Nb3+ 13. Kc2 Nxa1+ 1: This miss leaves the black with a huge advantages material wise, but in development the situation is less desperate for the white than you think
moves.19. Bg5 Qa5: Huge mistake gives the white a free piece
